name: Trivia Vault: 1980's Trivia
description: Welcome to the Trivia Vault contestant! Play as a contestant in a gameshow called Trivia Vault 1980's Trivia and bring your thinking hat. Answer questions about 1980's trivia as quickly as you can, the faster you answer the higher the cash value.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or higher Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 200 MB available space
